thread.title: MR. RAJU VEGESNA
thread.title_full: SkyLux Travel reviewed by MR. RAJU VEGESNA

author: MR. RAJU VEGESNA
title: MR. RAJU VEGESNA
text:
I enjoyed booking my business travel with Skylux. Bart was Very professional and helpful in meeting my travel requirements. He never put any pressure on me in pursuing what I am looking for my travel destination.
Very positive experience. Don't hesitate to recommend others.
Great Job.
